tha-ap549:5.2: asaṅkheyyampi yojanaṃ → asaṅkheyyepi yojane (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap549:9.4: sutvāna vimalaṃ ahaṃ → sutvāna vimalānahaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap549:19.2: kañcanagghiyaṃ → rajjaṃ pādesikaṃ ca yaṃ (bj); dibbānubhosahantadā (sya1ed, sya2ed); rajjapādesikañ ca yaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
